select.if: -- 1、按年和周数值分组 -- 2、先按年降序，再按周降序 SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(${params.xColumn}), '年 第', WEEK(${params.xColumn}, 1), '周') AS ${params.xColumn}, SUM(${params.yColumn}) total FROM jiankangshuju 1=1 ${ew.sqlSegment} GROUP BY YEAR(${params.xColumn}), WEEK(${params.xColumn}, 1) ORDER BY YEAR(${params.xColumn}) DESC, WEEK(${params.xColumn}, 1) DESC
